Articles.Content:
Hello,

When I try to disable a tank in the VAB or try to transfer fuel from one tank to another after launching the craft, the buttons are simply not clickable (It's the little green triangle/arrow thing next to the levels of the tanks, and the in and out buttons). When I try to click on any of these buttons, it throws the exception "Exception: NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object". This happens over multiple save files on any craft I try to create or edit.

Is this a corrupted file? If so, how would I fix it? I'm using the prerelease version 1.2 on Windows 10.

Hi @MrGhorm, 1.2 is still in development so you likely have a bug, please test for it in the latest pre-release and if it still exists consider reporting the issue on the KSP bug tracker.

Closing as there's little sense in providing tech support on a development release
